body_html: Folks, could you please use GitHub reactions rather than writing "+1" in a new message? Right now it produces a lot of spam for people who subscribed to updates in this thread. Thanks!
body_text: Folks, could you please use GitHub reactions rather than writing "+1" in a new message? Right now it produces a lot of spam for people who subscribed to updates in this thread. Thanks!
body: Folks, could you please use [GitHub reactions](https://github.com/blog/2119-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments) rather than writing "+1" in a new message? Right now it produces a lot of spam for people who subscribed to updates in this thread. Thanks!
